comments.body: This test should make sure that build_import_library actually creates a useful build library, but that is something for another PR. CPython [builds it](https://github.com/python/cpython/blob/v3.6.9/Tools/msi/dev/dev.wixproj#L38) using [`gendef`](https://sourceforge.net/p/mingw-w64/wiki2/gendef/). Maybe we should just deprecate the whole thing?
